name: Aloha Serviced Apartment
address: Lane 169/22, No. 09 Kim Ma Street, Ba Dinh District, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Aloha Serviced Apartment is set in Hanoi, 600 metres from One Pillar Pagoda. Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum is 700 metres from the property.

The accommodation has a cable flat-screen TV. Some units have a dining area and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a stovetop. A minibar and kettle are also offered. Every unit is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower. Bed linen is provided.

Aloha Serviced Apartment also includes a terrace.

Hanoi Temple of Literature is 800 metres from Aloha Serviced Apartment, while Vietnam Fine Arts Museum is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 20 km from the property.
